Hotec - Responsive Hotel, Spa & Resort WP Theme

Hotec is a sleek and clean responsive WordPress theme for your spa, resort and hotel business. However it’s so versatile that you can use it for everything you want (corporate website, portfolio…) The layout looks beautiful at any size, be it a laptop screen, iPad, iPhone, Android Mobile or tablets.

01. Theme Features

  • Fully Responsive (Tested on Multiple Devices)
  • Full Width Layout or Boxed Layout
  • HTML5 and CSS3 Tableless Design
  • Working Contact Form (Ajax)
  • Working Resservation Form (Ajax)
  • jQuery Enhanced: Portfolio, Rooms, Gallery Filtering
  • Built on SmoothThemes Framework
    • Smart Drag & Drop Page Builder
    • Advanced Theme Options
    • Background Uploader
    • Favicon Uploader
    • Logo Uploader
    • 500+ Google Fonts with Preview Capability
    • Unlimited Colors
  • Multimedia Post
    • Post With Slideshow
    • Post with Embedded Video (YouTube and Vimeo)
    • Post with Feature Image
  • Premium Resources
    • LayerSlider (15$ Value)
    • Revolution Slider (15$ Value)
  • Flexslider included
  • 10 Predifined Colour Schemes
  • Event List and Event Calendar
  • Compatible Browsers: IE8+, Firefox, Safari, Opera, Chrome
  • Included documentation.
Back to top

Installation

Unzip the file you download after purchase . The following files and folders will be in the unzipped file:

  • Hotec.zip
  • Licensing
  • PSDs
  • Documentation

The theme can be uploaded in two ways:

  • FTP upload: Using your FTP program, upload the non-zipped Hotec folder into the /wp-content/themes/ folder on your server.
  • WordPress upload: Navigate to Appearance > Add New Themes > Upload. Go to browse, and select the zipped Hotec folder. Hit Install Now and the theme will be uploaded and installed.

Once the theme is uploaded, you need to activate it. Go to Appearance > Themes and activate Hotec theme.

If you need help installing Wordpress see the link here : http://codex.wordpress.org/Installing_WordPress

After the install finish, go to Hotec theme setting page, then cick Save All Change to import default value to database.

Install Sample Data:

Hotec has included wordpress XML demo file, you can see at /assets/sample-data/ . Following this step to import demo data to your site:

  1. Go to Tools > Import
  2. Select XML demo file from /assets/sample-data/
  3. Submit Upload file and import.
  4. Assign posts to an exitsting account.
  5. Check to Download and import file attachments
  6. Submit and wait when WP tools download attachments to your wordpress site
Back to top

Import layerSlider dummy data

You can find layerSlider import code in file: HOTEC_THEME_FOLDER/assets/dummy-data/layerslider-dummy.txt

Video Tutorials

Setting Up Homepage as Demo Site

Logo Setting

  1. Go to Hotec Theme Setting page.
  2. Click to Logo setting under General setting tab.
  3. Select logo from your computer then click Save All Change button.

Site Navigation

  1. Go to Menu setting page under Appearance tab.
  2. Click to the plus icon to create new Menu item
  3. Select Page/Category,.. to add to menu
  4. Click Save
  5. Select localtion for menus
  6. Click Save Menu butto on the right then you are done.
Back to top

Top bar right text

  1. Go to Widgtets setting page under Appearance tab.
  2. Drag widget "Text" to sidebar "Top bar right widget" and paste your custom code to textarea.
  3. Click Save Button.
Here is same code: 
<ul class="top-bar-contact">
<li class="top-bar-address">36 Wall Street, USA, <a href="page-contact.php">View on Map</a></li>
<li class="top-bar-phone">Call Us: <span>1-500-456-9875</span></li>
<li class="top-bar-mail"><a href="#">Reservation@hotec.com</a></li>
</ul>
Back to top

Header Button

  1. To to Theme Option
  2. Click to Reservation Button

If you want to show this button please make sure option "Show reservation button in header" is Yes. You can see button postion Here (Postion 5)

In this page, You can select custom label, link, color for this button.

Header Element Positions

  1. Top bar menu.
  2. Top bar right text.
  3. Logo.
  4. Main Navigation.
  5. Custom button.

Page Builder and Options Overview

  1. List of page builder items.
  2. Page builder items is actived in canvas. Click to pencil icon to edit builder item.
  3. Select Layout for this page
  4. Select Sidebar for this page, then go to Appearance -> Widget to manager widget.
  5. Option to disable page title
  6. Option to enable top page element (Slider, titlebar, custom HTMl code)
  7. Top element options
Back to top

Create and Set Homepage

First, Create a new page, using page builder to built homepage content, then go to Settings > Reading and choose that page as Front page.

Page Slider

  1. Enable Show top element
  2. Select top element type (Layer Slider, Revolution Slider)
  3. Select Slider to display

You must add Layer Slider or Revolution Slider befor use this options

Page Tilebar

  1. Enable Show top element
  2. Select top element type as titlebar
  3. Fill titlebar title, descriptions, background image.

You can leave empty titlebar title, descriptions, background image.

The result will look like example below:

Page Tilebar

  1. Enable Show top element
  2. Select top element type as HTML code
  3. Enter you custom code
Example google map code: 
                  <iframe width="100%" scrolling="no" height="500px" frameborder="0" marginheight="0"
                   marginwidth="0" src="http://maps.google.ca/maps?f=q&source=s_q&hl=en&geocode=&q=New+York&sll=49.891235,-97.15369&sspn=47.259509,86.923828&ie=UTF8&hq=&hnear=New+York,+United+States&ll=40.714867,-74.005537&spn=0.019517,0.018797&z=14&iwloc=near&output=embed"></iframe>

The result will look like example below:

Create Sidebar

By default Hotec come with 7 sidebar for sidebar-left, sidebar-right. header-right and footer. To create another sidebar please follow the picture below :

  1. Go to Hotec theme setting page
  2. Click to Custom Sidebars tab and click add more
  3. Edit the sidebar title
  4. Click Save All Change

Then new sidebar widget area will display on Widget Page.

Select Sidebar For Page

Go to Page edit page and you will see the section for select sidebar for page.

Select Sidebar For Category

The sidebar you create in above section will appear at right side of this page. Try dragging the widget in side the sidebar box.

Javascripts

This theme contains many advanced jQuery functions and libraties.

All javascript files (at assets/js/ folder) :

  • jquery-1.4.4.min.js
  • jquery.prettyPhoto.js
  • jquery.fitvids.js?ver=1.0
  • jquery.flexslider.js?ver=1.0
  • jquery.carouFredSel-6.2.0-packed.js
  • custom.js

If you feel the need to customize any functions for any reason, open and edit custom.js file in your theme's scripts directory /wp-content/themes/magazon/assets/js/

Recommend Plugins

WordPress offers tons of plugins which confuses the new user. Not just that but there are multiple plugins that serves the same purpose and have the same functions. Which one do you need to get the upper edge. I only mentioning the plugins that you need to start off your blog or make your website better with my theme .

  • Akismet
  • WordPress SEO by Yoast
  • Contact Form 7
  • W3 Total Cache
  • Google Sitemap Generator
